faqs.question: How long does media wall installation take in Cardiff?
faqs.answer: Most Cardiff media wall installations are completed in 3 days. This includes building the timber frame structure, installing all electrical components, mounting your TV and fire, concealing all wiring, and applying your chosen finish. Simple designs may take 2 days, while larger or more complex media walls with extensive storage can take 4-5 days. We'll provide an exact timeline during your free home survey.
